title: FISME to launch digital lending platform for MSMEs; signs MoU with financial guarantee provider Eqaro - The Financial Express
content: FISME to launch digital lending platform for MSMEs; signs MoU with financial guarantee provider Eqaro  The Financial Express
description: Credit and Finance for MSMEs: FISME said the platform is expected to be launched this year and will provide access to collateral-free capital up to Rs 25 lakh to fulfil MSMEsâ€™ need for urgent funds post due diligence of their businesses.
